title: Doomsday or deep value: India's IT stocks at crossroads after 20% crash
description: India's Nifty IT index is experiencing a significant downturn, with investors fearing artificial intelligence could render the current IT model obsolete. While some analysts see an attractive entry point due to market overreaction, others warn of sustained underperformance and structural obsolescence, questioning the sector's long-term trajectory and current valuations.

title: Anthropic cuts off Claude access to China's Communist Party
description: US-based artificial intelligence company Anthropic has said it cut off access to its AI model Claude for firms linked to the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), forgoing several hundred million dollars in revenue as part of efforts to safeguard America's technological lead.

title: Anthropic CEO says AI company cannot accede to Pentagon demands
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei says the artificial intelligence company “cannot in good conscience accede” to the Pentagon’s demands to allow wider use of its technology.
content: WASHINGTON — Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday the artificial intelligence company “cannot in good conscience accede” to the Pentagon’s demands to allow unrestricted use of its technology, deepening the unusually public clash with the Trump ad... [4058 chars]

title: AI Gains Can Be Unlocked Without Cutting Jobs, Morningstar Says
description: Companies are increasingly using artificial intelligence as justification for cutting headcount and trimming costs, rather than using the technology to boost productivity by redeploying workers, according to Morningstar Inc.
content:
Companies are increasingly using artificial intelligence as justification for cutting headcount and trimming costs, rather than using the technology to boost productivity by redeploying workers, according to Morningstar Inc.

title: Deadline looms in AI fight between Anthropic and the Pentagon : NPR
